task_description: Implement procedural voxel world generation using quaternion field interpolation (fabric approach) that generates continuous surfaces by evaluating quaternion values at octree nodes and detecting sign changes for surface extraction.
completed_work: Phase 1: Pre-Requirements - Cube Value Extension (3/3 complete)
Phase 5: Surface Detection and Normals (5/5 complete)
Phase 6: Max Depth Rendering Support (5/5 complete)
Phase 8: Model Selector Page UI (7/7 complete)
pending_work: Phase 10.3: Test fabric rendering with various additive state configurations (manual)
Phase 10.4: Verify model selector UI works correctly (manual)
